# GenoUtils

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/opain/GenoUtils/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/opain/GenoUtils/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

This package contains functions that are used by the GenoDisc and GenoPred pipelines.

## Installation

You can install the development version of GenoUtils from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("opain/GenoUtils")
```
